QuestData.Title: Competitive Devotion
QuestData.Description: Okay, I know dis situation is serious, but she gave you de power of her loa? Sounds to me like Loti is more big on recruiting than on dealing with dis blood troll threat.$b$bInside de temple behind me are three guardians. When I walked in dere, de things tried to kill me. Me!$b$bSomeone has corrupted our own guardians.$b$bHere, I will lend you de voice of my own loa, Pa'ku, de pterrordax. Use it to crush dis corruption.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay the 3 Corrupted Guardians of Zanchul.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wardruid Loti in Zanchul
